summary: This is an email from June 17, 2019, containing a link to a 2015 Curbed.com article detailing Jeffrey Epstein's extensive real estate holdings. The email is addressed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, suggesting the article was being shared for investigative or informational purposes related to the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references an article detailing his extensive property and real estate holdings.

events.title: Publication of Epstein Real Estate Article
events.description: Curbed.com publishes an article detailing Jeffrey Epstein's extensive property and real estate holdings.

events.title: Email Sharing Article with Prosecutor
events.description: An email is sent containing a link to the 2015 Curbed article to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: An email dated June 17, 2019, was sent to an Assistant United States Attorney in the SDNY.
The email contained a link to a 2015 Curbed.com article about Jeffrey Epstein's real estate holdings.
This suggests prosecutors were actively gathering information on Epstein's assets and financial profile in 2019.
